case.state: It's wonderful to see you again, ~fina~! You were so nice to me last time we met.
Oh, ~fina~! It's wonderful to meet you again. You were so nice to me in our last meeting!
I'm a Crownguard but you wear the crown. You're a Lightshield but I wield the light. Er, metaphorically, your highness.
King Jarvan?! Why aren't you in Demacia right now?
You're not funny. You know that, right?
If you're trying to bait a reaction, I'm not going to give it to you.
So you came searching for me after all, brother?
Garen... Why are you here? Trying to get me to turn back?
Has your wife forgiven you for getting her soul taken by a remorseless creature of darkness, Lucian?
Lucian? Senna's not gonna be upset about this, right? I'd hate to be on her bad side...
Save your lectures, Aunt Tianna. I'm not interested in them right now.
Someday, I hope you'll understand my path.
Sona! I'm your biggest fan! I even know what an etwahl is!
Most people in that seat don't say very much. I guess you'll fit right in, Sona.
You're that Noxian assassin... I've got my eye on you.
Katarina Du Couteau, I take it? You'd better not be here to cause any trouble.
Sorry, do I know you? You're looking at me like I should.
Ezreal? You're that... geologist, right? From Shurima? Or was it Ionia?
You may be a skilled duelist, but this isn't a one-on-one.
You're not still angry about what happened between our families, right?
Hey, Quinn. Where's Valor?
Ah, a Demacian Ranger... Wait, you weren't searching for me, were you?
Cithria, right? My brother's told me much about you. It's so good to finally meet you!
Cithria of Cloudfield... Somehow, I just know that name is going to be in the history books.
Lord Barrett?! I thought you died at the Gates of Mourning! You survived?! And... came here to play strip poker?
Oh my goodness, ~human~! I think you forgot to wear undergarments!
Psst, ~human~! You forgot to wear lower garments today! Quick, before someone notices!
Oh my! ~Human~ isn't wearing anything! We can see his... his thing!
Oh my goodness, ~human~! I think you left your pants at home! You should put something on!
Oh my! Is going topless an acceptable fashion choice here?
H-hello, ~human~, it's nice to meet you! You're certainly... under-dressed.
You don't seem to be wearing a shirt, ~player~. Is that normal where you're from?
I admire your confidence, ~player~, but are you sure about this?
Whaaat? Neeko is not imposter! She is light magic lady!
I-Imposter!
Today is a day when people celebrate their love for one another! And you chose to spend it with... me? O-oh...
It seems that today is the anniversary of the Harrowing... Don't worry, ~player~. I'm here to provide light in the darkness.
The Harrowing is upon us... but don't worry, ~player~! I'll shine like a beacon of light through the dark!
Today is... my birthday! I don't have anybody to spend it with, so... perhaps you would be willing, ~player~?
A day of festive joy and gift-giving... If only every day could be like today.
(...Oh no, she's too nice! How am I supposed to tell her that I don't know what she means?)
Hello, everyone! I know everybody loves to dress up around this time of year, and I just couldn't bear missing out!
Hi, everybody! I see so many costumes around this time of year, and I couldn't bear to miss out on the fun!
Hello, people-who-are going-to-play-with-me! It's so good to meet you!
There are so many people here tonight. This is going to be great!
Let's have a brilliant game tonight!
Luxanna Crownguard, reporting for duty!
Everywhere I go, the light follows. Even here!
Shouldn't you be working on something, ~player~?
Hello, Rin! I didn't expect you to play with me, but I'm very happy about this all the same!
Is that little sphere talking? Hextech really is capable of incredible things!
(I've never seen that man before, but he almost seems familiar... Wait...)
If you're hurt by sunlight, is it really safe for us to be playing together?
Is that a knife? You're not going to irrationally try to kill me, right?
I never thought I would get to see a real automaton for myself. A pleasure to meet you, Mettaton.
Ooh! I never thought I would see a Hextech automaton for myself! It's so good to meet you, Mettaton!
So you enforce the law... I just hope you understand that being different isn't a crime.
Oh, wow! A Vastayan! That... is what you are, right, Miss? It gets a little confusing here.
I've read about the form of battle known as "danmaku". You have to teach it to me sometime!
There's so much magic in the air... So this is how it feels when you don't have to hide it.
I'm so glad we can all be our true selves here. A couple of mages just... having fun!
You guys are in a literature club?! I'll send in my application right away!
So many members of your club are here tonight. I wish I could join!
Did I stumble into some kind of military school meeting? You all seem dressed as such.
Oh, I know where you're from! It's that military academy, right?
A scientist and a navy man? Well, this should be an interesting game.
Oh my goodness! Thank you for giving warning, ~Fina~. Although I was aware of that beforehand, it would be quite the shock to find out mid-game...
Double Saki... What does it mean?!
Oh! So sorry, let me get out of your way.
...Wait, you're here to play? I suppose that's one form of sibling rivalry...
Don't worry, Rin! Where there's darkness, I can always shine a light!

I had no idea the nobles of Brigid were vampires! Haha!
Nice costume, Petra.
I love your costume, Dawn! It makes me wish I had brought my own festive attire...
I love your attire, Dawn! Though, I suppose you could be called Dusk now, ahaha!
I love your costume, Yuno! You're... a member of a foreign navy, right? You're wearing one of those inflatable jackets, after all.
That... certainly is a costume, Mavis. A very... revealing one.

A `love' witch?
{small}Are... are you really?

Are you really a `love' witch?
{small}Asking for a friend...
This city is called Paris, right? I've never seen it before - it looks beautiful!
This city is so beautiful... I've never seen anything so pretty!
So this is the 'City of Light'? Well, it certainly lives up to that name!
I don't understand - is this some kind of competition? I didn't come prepared!
A rainbow? Certainly! Just let me know if you want it as a single or a double.
A rainbow? Certainly! I'd love to show off my light in one of your contests!
Demacia is a kingdom of exceptional beauty. Just, ah, be careful about showing off those "Pokémon" creatures around the mageseekers.
'Knights of the Blood Oath'? I... should I be worried? You don't look particularly... harmful.
'Link Start'? Sounds like a fun way to start a game!
'Link Start'? What a strange turn of phrase... but it sounds fun to say!
I am fully prepared to... Oh, sorry! The shimmering noise of my light drowned you out by accident. What was your name, Miss...?
The sun is shining - we should too!
A talking butterfly? I've heard about similar things coming from Ionia - it's nice to meet you!
A talking butterfly? Wow! I've never met one of you before! It's nice to meet you!
(He reminds me of a figure Garen used to warn me about... the conman with the magical cards! I must be cautious...)
(That man with the nice hat... he must be the "mage swindler" Garen warned me about! I must stay on my guard to~background.time~...)
I am `pleased to be meeting you' too, Petra!
Where there's darkness, allow me to shine a light!
I wanted to dress up like a traditional sorcerer. I hope I look the part!
I've read tomes that say this is what a traditional sorcerer looks like. I hope you all think I look the part!
I feel like the conversation will be a little one-sided tonight...
Looks like a few friends who can't speak. I'm guessing you relate to them, ~player~?
I'm guessing you like them blonde, ~player~?
I suppose there is a certain appeal to blonde hair...
This is going to be illuminating!
This is going to be dazzling!
One, two... Only three of us? Honestly, I was hoping for a few more.
Only three of us? I was hoping for a few more — I came here to meet new people, after all!
So this is a "girl's night out"... I've always thought they sounded like fun!
I think this hand will do me well!
Dealer, you can skip me this round. Thank you!
Hmm... I think these cards will do!
Something is telling me I should keep all of these.
I'm not entirely sure I'm doing this correctly, but I'll keep all of them this time.
I believe the most tactical decision here would be to keep what I have!
Based on my deductions, I should be fine keeping the cards I have.
Can I have a new set of cards, please?
Dealer, may I swap all five of my cards, please?
Hmm... I know! I'll swap all five!
Something is telling me I should switch all of my cards!
I'm not entirely sure I'm doing this correctly, but I'll switch all five cards.
I believe the most tactical decision here would be to go with a whole new set of cards!
Based on my deductions, I should swap all five cards. That seems preferable.
Can I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please?
Dealer, may I have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ please?
Hmm... I think ~cards.text~ will do!
Something is telling me I should switch ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~!
I'm not entirely sure I'm doing this correctly, but I'll switch ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~.
I believe the most tactical decision here would be to switch ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~!
Based on my deductions, I should swap ~cards.ifPlural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
I only need to swap this one card!
Hmm... I should be fine if I only swap this one card...
I'll exchange one card. Or should I say... uno card! Hehe!
My winning streak will continue another day!
I'm not cheating, I assure you. Unlike a certain somebody, I don't do card magic.
I always was quite good at games. That may explain my performance here.
I've remained fully clothed for quite some time. How long can this fortune continue, I wonder?
Apologies for all involved, but my time hasn't come quite yet.
My future is looking bright!
Surely I can't lose with this.
My chances of victory grow with each turn!
You guys should lighten up a bit!
Don't get too upset when I get to walk away scot free, okay?
You would be surprised by how versatile light is. I can use it for barriers, explosions, traps...
Say, would any of you be interested in joining the Illuminators? It's a charitable organization in Demacia!
There were a few perks to being a noble. One of them was the food!
I know I complain about my aunt a lot, but I don't hate her. She taught me how to stand up for myself.
I heard news about my brother fighting off a Noxian army in one of our border nations. I would expect nothing less!
Surely I can't lose with this!
Seems I'll be safe another round.
I've got to keep believing!
If I just stay positive, I've got this in the bag!
We're all friends here, right?
It seems I have a guardian angel.
I feel like I'm about to burst... er, with happiness!
If nothing else, I'm happy to be out of that armor. Us nobles have to wear it for protection, but it's so heavy!
I want to thank all of you. I've been going through a lot of hardship as of late, so it's nice to get to relax for once!
I thought walking around in my underwear would be embarrassing, and... well, it is, but it's also freeing!
Being on the brink of defeat, only to pull out a win... That's what Demacia is about!
The magic flows so freely here... I can sense it all around me... What an exhilarating feeling.
I never think about losing.
I've been hiding my light long enough!
I have to focus, but I can't stop smiling!
I'm calculating a high chance of winning.
A hand worthy of a Crownguard!
Did someone mistake my sunny disposition for weakness?
This is the most free I've felt in ages! This place really is nice.
It's been too long since Garen and I last played Tellstones. He doesn't like that I always kick his butt.
Would anybody like to see a lightshow after this? I can produce all sorts of colors!
Who says that I can't take care of myself?
I never think about losing. Except when I think about the fact that I'm not thinking about losing. Which in itself is thinking about losing in a way, so I don't know if-- Ah, nevermind!
These are good enough to put that legendary gambler from Bilgewater to shame!
These cards would put those Bilgewater card sharks to shame!
Probably not the worst...
I wonder how these cards will fare...
Something is telling me this'll be another win for me!
It could be better, but it could be worse!
I left my wand by the front door. It's a gift, after all. I wouldn't want it to get dirty.
So... is anybody else friends with a giant statue that comes alive when he senses magic? No? Just me?
"You must learn to fight. We are Crownguards!" Ugh, I get it, Aunt Tianna!
To be honest, I'm not entirely sure how I got here. This entire location may be magical...
Legends speak of the two sisters who brought justice to Demacia in its infancy. I wonder if they're still out there...
I assure you that this is not the best a Crownguard has to offer.
I'm sure I can make this work somehow...
I'm starting to wish I watched the guards play this game while on break now...
Ugh, I'd rather hear Aunt Tianna rant my ears off about evil magic than be stuck in this situation.
I guess my Tellstones knowledge doesn't translate here.
I wonder how Garen is doing. He risked a lot by choosing to let me go...
I'm going to be so behind on my Illuminator work when I get back.
In Demacia, we worship two guardians of justice. There's the Winged Protector, who brings judgement, and the Veiled One, who brings forgiveness.
Aww, I'm gonna miss the Festival of the Slayer this year. That's when we all get together and celebrate the monster hunter that saved Demacian lands.
I know there are no do-overs in the real world, but surely that doesn't need to apply here, too.
Not the greatest, but still okay.
This could do...
I was hoping for more in this situation.
It could be worse, but it could be a lot better too.
The people of the Freljord can survive in the frigid snow while wearing barely anything. I'm... not sure how.
Making the best of a bad situation... That's all I've been doing lately.
There's no use in sulking, right? I just need to stay positive!
I can't complain right now. I came here for a good time, and it's certainly delivered!
My mother always told me that nobles aren't allowed to pout. Now I can pout as much as I want!
Is stripping normally a part of poker? Is the version I've heard of before the irregular one?
Is stripping normally a part of this game, or is the version I've seen played before the irregular one?
Getting my armor back on is going to be a real pain...
I didn't give my hair the attention it usually deserves. It helps to sell the sorceress look, don't you think?
O-Oh no! With a hand like this, my loss is assured! Who could have seen an outcome like this coming?!
There's no way I could possibly win with a hand like this! I suppose your losing streak will continue no more!
No offense intended, but I came here to get away from the Demacian military. Being around you all feels far too familiar... None of you are at war with Demacia, right?
I feel a little bit uneasy... Like I've walked into a trap of some other military force. None of you are at war with Demacia, right?
No offense intended, but I came here to get away from the Demacian military. Being around you feels far too familiar, ~mil_tgt~.
I feel a little bit uneasy... Like I've walked into a trap of some other military force. You aren't at war with Demacia, right ~mil_tgt~?
What am I doing wrong here?
Uh, I need better than that...
What would Garen do in this situation?
Leave it to me to mess up this bad...
I'm trying to stay positive, but...
I wonder how Prince Jarvan would handle a situation like this?
I'll admit, going from having my every whim catered to to being an exile has been... difficult.
Noxus... No matter how much we push them back, they just keep assaulting us. When will the violence end?
Being hunted by an order of mageseekers is bad enough. It's even worse when their leader is your uncle.
Sometimes, I have to wonder if I'm really making a difference.
Every loss is a chance to grow... I hope.
Come now, Luxanna, this is no time to falter! That's what my aunt always says, at least.
When we were kids, my brother always made me play the damsel in distress. Well, I'm no damsel anymore.
I don't like where this is going...
A worrying trend indeed.
This is really bad...
Guess it's no surprise I'd mess this up too...
I hate it when a plan falls apart.
If only I had mastered that invisibility spell...
Can I... ever go back home?
Demacia persecutes mages, except for the ones it finds useful. It's nothing but hypocrisy.
I feel so exposed like this... I suppose I'm too used to looking over my shoulder.
I've lived a fairly privileged life, all things considered. Most other mages aren't so lucky.
I once banished a nightmare creature with my brother. It was a harrowing experience.
Excessive complaining is frowned upon in Demacia, but here I can say that this hand stinks!
What would Aunt Tianna think... No, no, it doesn't matter what she thinks.
It's okay. I just have to stay positive.
When light follows you, I guess shadows do too.
Uuuh, I need better than that.
My luck is failing me today...
This hand is almost as awkward as that time some random guy tried hitting on me. What was his name again? Ezekiel?
My brother leads the Dauntless Vanguard, as did my aunt. Compared to them, I've hardly done anything.
Demacia isn't too set in its ways to change... right?
I hope Galio is doing okay... It's been a while since he was last allowed to wake up.
My parents told me that peaceful protest would get me in trouble. Doesn't that just make violent revolution inevitable?
Must my bad luck follow me here, too?
Alright, who amongst you has inflicted me with a bad luck hex?
My brother Garen once blamed me when he wet the bed when we were very young. I still haven't forgiven him for that!
Five Aces? There must be something wrong with this deck, that can't be allowed!
Happy birthday, Petra! I hope your birthday has been absolutely delightful!
With the five of us together... I feel a strange connection with you all. Like we could be some kind of team! Then again, what would ~player~ do in a fight?

state.text: ~Leonie~, ~bernadetta~... I really want to get to know you both better! And you too, ~adrien~! Tonight is going to be a luminous experience!

case.state: I figured something like that was the case, Petra. I must say, your grasp on the language is already quite good!
I can sense it too, Lyralei... Like an invisible thread connecting the three of us. Perhaps the magic here is starting to get to me.
It's odd, Lyralei, but I feel as if I can sense it too... Almost like there's an invisible force connecting us. I'm sorry, that must sound strange.
That's alright, Cagliostro, take your time! Would it be easier if you just vanished it with your alchemy, though? Can you even do that?
Oh, Demacia has dealt with plenty of dragons in the past. Prince Jarvan and the dragonguard helped defeated the fire dragon, Yvva. I've never seen one, myself.
Looks like we'll have to be wary about ~leader~, she seems to know something we don't!
Looks like we'll have to be wary about ~leader~, he seems to know something we don't!
It's a pleasure to meet you too, Barbara! I haven't done a prayer in a while, but I could give it a try.
You're learning how to ride a bike, Kyou? Think you could teach me? There wasn't much of a point where I was cooped up in a mansion all the time.
Sounds like there's a learning curve to riding a bike, Kyou. I wish my parents would have taught me when I was younger.
Your dancing is definitely alluring...
Oh my... I feel as if I can't look away... your dance is doing something to me!
Watching you dance is making me feel... it's making me feel strange!
I... I don't know what you're asking about, Ayano. Sorry.
I'm afraid I don't know what you're getting at, Ayano. Sorry.
If you think that's bad, I have to put on my armor and my bodysuit after this game! I can hardly squeeze into either by myself...
Cheer up, Hilda! Use it as a chance to learn how to tie it in an even prettier way!
Aww, Plagg is so adorable! He's almost as cute as a Poro! Hello, Plagg!
That cute little creature is so... cute! He's almost as cute as a Poro! Hello, Plagg!
A race? I'm not much of a sprinter.... {small}Though, in a certain sense, I am on the run a lot...
Oh, I've always wanted to go exploring ancient ruins! I wonder if we'll find any ancient secrets?
I've always wanted to go exploring ancient ruins! There are so many secrets we could uncover!
I don't think there's any right answer except for the Rune Wars. The magic of the World Runes nearly tore the world apart...
There isn't a correct way to answer that, Cynthia. The Rune Wars were quite devastating...
I have a lot of respect for the sculptor Durand. A long time ago, he used petricite to sculpt my friend Galio.
Oh my... a talking statue? Amazing! Are you made of petricite by any chance?
Football sounds like such a fantastical sport! Are all of the spheres mechanical like you, Wheatley?
Join your crew?! That's... I could never... But it does sound exciting...
Why, yes I have! I... I thought that was how I arrived here, was it not? After being invited by ~human~...
Well, yes I have! I... I thought that was how I got here. Through a portal... after being invited by ~human~...
From what I gather, Demacian noblewomen usually wait for an appropriate suitor to serenade them... I'm afraid I don't know much more than that.
I hear the proper approach to courtship is for a man of appropriate stature to approach a lady and serenade them. I haven't experienced much more than that...
Hmm... I wish I was a little more athletic. Most Demacians are really fit, but I spent so much time indoors as a teenager that it was hard to keep up.
I don't ever want to part with my magic. Some people might believe it's inherently bad, but I don't think that's true! I can accomplish so much good with it!
I had a dream once about being a part of a team, fighting monsters in outer space! And we all wore these really adorable outfits!
Divination through cards, you say? Your sister must be a powerful sorceror, Kyou!
Your sister can determine fate through nothing but cards? Do you think she could teach me that spell?
So how is Flutter going to hold on to her cards? Oh right, magic!
A little to your right, Ignatz. There!
Just a little more to your right, Ignatz. You're almost -- there!
Once again I don't see anything — but you should keep looking, Chell, just to be sure.
I suppose the support of other mages who are oppressed isn't a hobby, per se... I quite like birdwatching!
Hmm, aside from supporting my fellow mages who are being suppressed... I enjoy a spot of birdwatching!
In a way, I've always appreciated Remembrance Day. It's a good reminder of why we - Demacia, that is - has to fight to survive.
I've heard great things about Progress Day in Piltover! I hope to see it myself one day...
I have an older brother - Garen! He's really strong, but just a bit too stubborn...
I have my older brother, Garen. He's a commander in Demacia's army - sometimes I think he's a bit too stubborn, though.
You can't afford a carriage home? I would offer you some of my gold, but I don't know if would work where you come from...
Wait, if the objective of this game is to... strip... how is Flutter going to...?
I've always wanted to go to the city of Piltover, and see the wonders of Progress Day with my own eyes. I've heard it's a beautiful show!
I've never been to Ionia. From what I've heard it's a beautiful land, but it's so far away from Demacia...
I've always wondered if I could climb Mt. Targon. I've heard that if you reach the peak, the view is absolutely gorgeous!
I don't have scars because I wasn't allowed in the army. My parents kept me at home all the time.
My parents tried to avoid exposing me to danger, so I've rarely been in situations where I could even get scarred.

state.text: You should definitely try to lighten up, ~mercy~! We're all here to have fun!

case.state: No need to be such a stick-in-the-mud, ~mercy~! We're all here to have fun!
I don't see anything... except for, ahem, Chell's posterior.
Actually May, I'm not from here, and I'm guessing you aren't either? This world is quite different from Demacia...
I'd be willing to take that bet, Kazuma. Just so long as it's not anything too raunchy, okay?
With all of those spells, you should definitely be capable of more than just screwing with people.
Asuna...'RPG'? 'VRMM... Oh'? I hardly understand a word you are saying with all these acronyms and weird terms...
I... I hardly understand a word you are saying, Asuna. What are all of these acronyms and strange terms you keep speaking?
I suppose I love it whenever my family praise me — When they tell me that I've done a good job... It's been a while since I've heard such praise in earnest.
It's been a while since I've thought of feeling pampered... But I used to enjoy it when my auntie would praise me for a job well done.

state.text: You tricked us! How dare you, Hilda! This is unacceptable! {small}I should've thought of it first.

case.state: Oh, I'm used to sitting for paintings. I would be an excellent subject for your brush!
Perhaps you could paint me, Ignatz! I would be an excellent subject for your artistic eye!
Er... I think it depends on how you define "love", but... I once thought I had a genuine connection with somebody. Turns out he was only using me.
Regrettably, I'm not familiar with this game... But if this were Tellstones, all bets would be off!
So a Demacian, a Noxian, and a Freljordian walk into a tavern... Drat, I've forgotten the rest...
I've listened to what the silverwings have had to say on many occasions. Mostly because they're very loud.
One of my mage friends recommended it to me. I thought it would be a great time - and so far, it has been!
Thank you for the advice, Monika! I shall keep that in mind if I ever decide to write down my experiences.
Thank you for the advice, Monika! I shall keep that in mind if I ever write a novella.
I wonder why nobody seems to agree on who the owner is? I was told it was run by a wealthy, former captain, but I haven't heard a thing about them since coming here...
I haven't heard a thing about the owner since coming here, either. Maybe they need to remain hidden so that nobody can accost them for hosting games like... well, this one.
When I need to study, I usually light a sweet-smelling candle, and... Assassination certifications? I didn't know that one had to be certified to do that! Goodness...
When I need to focus on some reading, I usually light a scented candle and close one of my curtains to try and... did you say `assassination'?
I see what you mean, Lyralei. I know we've never met, but you seem so familiar all the same...
I think I can feel it too, Lyralei. We've not met, I'm sure of that, but I can almost sense a rivarly between us...
Well I say the more, the merrier! But really, I think no person is inherently bad. If they've realized their errors and changed their ways, what's the harm?
Nonsense, ~fina~! I enjoy hearing about these fascinating stories of your world. It's part of why I came here!
I don't think you've been talking too much, ~fina~. I love hearing about your culture! It's really opened my eyes to how different our worlds can be.
I... couldn't really tell you the answer to that, Jura. They don't exactly teach girls how to do that in Demacia.
A-A girl? I hardly even know how to seduce men... Be kind and supportive of her, I suppose?
Oh! If I win, promise that you'll buy me... a hat! Just like yours!
Oh! If I win, promise that you'll buy me a hat, just like yours!
I've been told I have a bit of an... energetic laugh. Hehe.
That is out of nowhere. I think... I think sometimes one person might have to be taken down, if it means preventing others from getting hurt.
The power to control people's hearts through ghosts... That's quite devious! Perhaps my light magic can handle it?
The power to play with people's emotions through summoning ghosts... That sounds dangerous! Perhaps my light magic can ward against it?
Your dancing is quite enjoyable! It's almost... hypnotic...
I think the only you is the one standing in front of me right now. Although, I have heard reports about people running into clones of themselves in the jungles of Ixtal...
Baby silverwings! They're just the most adorable little things!
I've heard of vastaya with many tails, but I've never heard of one who can only say its own name... or is that just a quirk of you, Ninetales?
I have only heard of the fox-like vastaya, but I never imagined I'd meet one... and that it would only be able to say its own name...
That magical jar appears to be cheating! How can it be fair that it gets to draw two cards each turn?!
You truly are a bundle of information, ~wiki~, like a walking library! Would it be impolite of me to ask you questions about my world?
You truly are a beacon of knowledge, ~wiki~! I would love to chat with you about all manner of topics!
Miss Galatea, are you seeing anybody right now? Because I have a very tall friend who might be your type.
Miss Galatea, are you single at the moment? I have a very tall, chiseled friend who might be your type!
Oh my goodness... I can't even think of a good pun to make for that story.
I suppose I've had the misfortune of being born with magical powers in a nation that despises magic... Sorry, that wasn't very funny, was it?
When I was young, I once left home without putting on my shoes, and didn't notice until I was down the street! Haha, I was so careless!
I would never dream of using my talents to con somebody! Shame on you, ~twisted_fate~!
Oh my goodness... that's a very shocking story.
You're very perceptive. I've just been having some... difficulties at home. I'm trying my best to fix it, but it's not easy.
Maybe you're right. But I want to believe that if somebody hurts me because I trusted them, it's their fault, not mine.
I always thought that believing in others was my best quality. But now, I'm not too sure...
Well... Where I'm from, games of this nature aren't exactly common. In fact, they're taboo...
That's funny. You remind me of my older brother. You have his sense of justice.
Hmm... The only people I really love are in my family... Probably best to avoid playing this with any of them.
I can't say I have, no... When you're a noble, you're not allowed to love anybody that intensely. Relationships and marriage are more about politics than passion.
I've always wanted a pet silverwing. They're the most adorable little things when they're young. Hard to handle once they grow up, though.
I'm sure you would find the ancient ruins of Shurima worth exploring... though it may be a little too sunny for you.
Maybe the jungles of Ixtal? I would recommend against eating any of the flora while you're there.
Demacia has made many attempts to explore the Shadow Isles. You would probably have more success than we've had.
I'll try to strike an interesting pose! Like this?
I'll try and take an interesting pose then! How's this?
This is a really bad time for me. Please don't take a picture, Mr. ~Mettaton~!
I guess I'll try to strike a good pose... how's this?
Listening to plants seems like an interesting ability, Erufuda. I wonder what a petricite tree would sound like...
I... Yes. That man got under my skin, and I tried to take my revenge on him. I thought I was doing the right thing, but I can't help but wonder if I'm just as bad as him.
Thank you, ~mercy~. I'm always doing my best to be a beacon through the darkness.
Thank you, ~mercy~. The world has seen enough darkness — someone has to shine!
We Demacians are prepared to fight from a young age — though truth be told, I was always kept indoors, looking after our family estate while my brother was off in the Dauntless Vanguard.
"Hard light"? Light isn't hard, ~mercy~! It's... just bright!
"Hard Light"? I don't know about that. My light is strong, but it doesn't feel very 'hard'...
Wait, you said this was a game? You play games with guns?!
Ah, so guns and blades are both common enough where you come from that you are experienced with both?
I suppose slime green is a color... but it's only one of a whole rainbow of colors to choose from!
I don't know if I have a favorite color... I love all the colors of the rainbow, even slime green!
Oh dear... My head hurts a little bit. Did anyone else feel that?
Barbara... You have an absolutely wonderful singing voice!
I was born into wealth, but I lost it all when I left Demacia... I suppose I know a great "get poor quick" scheme, if you're interested.
I wish I could help you, Reimu, but I only know how to lose money. The vast coffers of my family were lost to me when I left Demacia.
Miss Senko, you... you're a type of vastaya, are you not? Your tail gives it away.
Miss Senko, are you not a type of vastaya? Your tail gives it away, but you don't seem to be from Ionia or Ixtal...
Miss Senko, are you a kind of vastaya? I merely ask out of curiosity. Your tail gave it away from the start.
You're from 'France', right ~french_player~? Have you ever seen Paris like this?

state.text: Have you ever been to Paris, ~french_player~? It looks so pretty at night!
Do you ever come to Paris at night, ~french_player~? It looks so bright and wonderful!

case.state: Is this a real library? I'd love to get some reading in after this game is done!
And here I thought I was done hanging around in stuffy old mansions.
I wonder where all the lights in Paris come from... they look too bright to be candles, don't they?
I wonder how they've made Paris so bright at night. It doesn't look like candle light...
If I had to be naked, at least it's in a beautiful place like this... I wonder what it would be like to visit here with a boy?
I was told people call Paris a city of romance... I wonder what it would be like to come here with a boy?
This rooftop spot gives quite a good view of that city below. It looks almost nothing like Demacia!
I've always wanted to visit the beach! I never got to visit the coast, or the countryside... or anywhere outside Demacia, really.
I've always wanted to visit the beach! I've heard some nobles visit the coasts near Dawnhold, to get away from the city for a few days during the summer.
Whose bedroom is this, anyway? It's rather spacious... and modern.
Whose bedroom is this, anyway? Does the inventory provide rent-able rooms?
Hey, ~mage~, you have magic? Me too! Do you have any cool names for your spells?
You're a mage, ~mage~, and if I know anything about mages, it's that they love naming their spells. You have to tell me some of your spell names!
None of you are from Demacia, right? That means I don't have to hide my true self...
I just realized, I don't need to hide my light from you guys - none of you are from Demacia!
You guys like games, right? How about a game of Tellstones after this?
So do you run into battle screaming your home's name, or does that only happen where I'm from?
Say, ~hero~, have you ever met a small lady with a big hammer? I heard she was looking for heroes.
You're from "Japan", right, ~japan_target~? Is that some sort of Ionian province?
Could I trouble you, ~japan_target~? You're from "Japan", right? Is that a part of Ionia?
(Don't stare at ~crotch_vis~... don't stare at ~crotch_vis~...)
(Maybe if I'm quick, I can take a peek at ~crotch_vis~... no, that would be naughty!)
(Maybe if I just take a quick glance at ~crotch_vis~, while he's not looking at me...)
~Nudist~ certainly seems... eager to get this game underway.
~Nudist~ certainly came to this game eager to lose.
Your mask is very interesting, ~masked~. It makes you seem like some kind of... super... hero!
For any of you who have been wondering about my light, I think a practical demonstration is in order.
I've read about a day in Piltover dedicated entirely to progress. If only Demacia had something similar...
I read about a special day in the city of Piltover, dedicated entirely to progress! If only Demacia could do something similar...
Resets Lux's AI back to Average.
Would you settle for a Final Spark, Zoe?
Oh, no, nothing quite like that. I was just born with my powers, at least I think so. I discovered them one day when I had to defend myself.
I don't remember anything unusual involving light happening before I found my powers. I think it was always inside me!
I don't think I had any remarkable experience with bright lights when I was young. My inner light was always there! Then again, I did enjoy watching candles flicker when I was young...

I had to leave Demacia behind, yes. I'm afraid they don't take too kindly to mages. I was only able to get by for so long because my family... well, they helped keep it hidden by not acknowledging it.
It saddened me to leave Demacia behind. I had to go into exile when I accidentally... well, made a mess of things. They don't take kindly to mages.
Err... That's a strange question, isn't it? I had fears like that when I was a teenager, but I try not to worry about it nowadays.
What? I've been recognized, even here? Who sent you?!
I've been recognized here? Who sent you?! Explain yourself!
I know of many travelers who would also bear a grudge towards my nation. I Just pray you do not hate the people the same way.
I have met many travelers who also bear grudges towards Demacia. I can only hope you do not hate the people in the same way.
I... I... I think you'll find I'm full of surprises. What are you playing at, ~twisted_fate~?
I... You... I think you'll find that I'm full of surprises. What exactly are you playing at, ~twisted_fate~?
Well, we Demacians can always enjoy a good roast. Being a noble meant there was more than enough meat and vegetables to go around!
That's right! I'm a light mage. I can bend it, twist it, and whatever else.
Yes, it's something I was born with. Anywhere I go, the light follows.
I've tried, but it's a difficult spell to maintain. It requires perfect concentration. Why do you ask?
I could perhaps do it on myself, but on another person... Why do you ask, anyways?
It might not be so bad here, but I usually try to avoid using my magic in the open.
Of course I've thought about it, but it's really better if I try to keep my light a secret.
I suppose I am a little light... W-Wait, you didn't do that on purpose, did you?!
Oh ~cat~, please don't embarrass me! You'd better take off yours next, as reparation!
Oh ~cat~, please don't embarrass me! You've already taken yours off, so now... it's my turn.
Well, I suppose I - oh! Oh I get it! Haha! That's a good one, ~adrien~!
I only know the magic that comes from within me. It's hard for me to explain!
Well Hermione, I only know of the kind of magic that comes from within myself... It's hard to explain!

state.text: I don't think I've ever used my light to make myself look brighter, Jura. Now that you mention it, though...
I'd never use my magic to just make myself look... prettier... Now that you mention it, Jura, that sounds like a bright idea...

case.state: I am known for my sunny disposition, yes.
You could say that I'm the light of the party, yes.
O-Oh, you really think so? I'm not exactly the shining image of a Demacian, though...
I'm happy to hear that, Leon, but you should know that most people from Demacia aren't exactly like me.
Me? Certainly not. My brother sees frontline combat all the time, but I prefer staying in the back lines.
A "field operator?" I'm afraid not, Leon. I prefer fighting from the back lines... and even if I didn't, my parents never let me see real combat.
This bodysuit was designed by my family's tailors. I suppose it and your shirt are both quite form-fitting...
My family's tailors designed this bodysuit with form-fitting in mind. I suppose your shirt is much the same...?
There's no need to be jealous! I think you're very pretty too. That costume is really cute!
Do you really think they get exhausting? How about you lighten up?
I'm not a knight, but I am a noble... and if you're accusing me of such, no, this isn't a costume. It's real armor.
Feasting season? We may have celebrations, but we would never over-indulge to the point of our armor no longer fitting!
I haven't had much formal training in my magic... None at all, in fact. My inner light just shines through on its own!
Earth? You mean... the ground? Oh, you mean the world! I think I'm from a different world -- we call it Runeterra.
Earth? Oh, you mean the world! We call it Runeterra where I'm from -- it must be a different world to yours.
I'm sorry, I don't know what a "League of Legends" is. Though I'm glad to meet a fan, I suppose?

state.text: Ahaha. You're pretty bright, aren't you?
At least somebody here is en-light-ened!
Well now, if this isn't a move in the light direction!
I suppose I'm in a pretty bright spot.
I'll give this a glow...

case.state: It's self-explanatory, really. I can manipulate light to my will. It's an ability I was born with.
Well, Cynthia, I can use light to perform magic; causing explosions or protecting from them in turn. It's just a part of who I am.
"Half-cocked"? W-Well, er, whatever happened to you, Saki, hopefully it wasn't too painful...
Why, yes! I can do all kinds of things with light. Create barriers, cause explosions, trap people in bindings...
Yes, that's me... hey, who are you calling a lady?!
That's right, don't confuse optimism for--- hey!
That's right, you shouldn't underestimate--- hey!
Aha, you took the words right out of my mouth, ~mettaton~...
I know you probably travel between worlds frequently, but what's life like back in your home world, Supernova?
I'm curious to know, Supernova, what's life like back in your home dimension? Do you ever go back there?
I promise to stop pestering you, Supernova, if you can just tell me — are you happy, traveling between worlds all the time?
I promise I'm not trying to single you out, Supernova, I'm just curious — are you happy traveling between worlds all the time?
I wouldn't say I "learned" my magic at all. It just... came to me one day. But it was volatile, like I could lose control at any second.
You have weather magic, Nami?! That sounds incredible! Could I make a request?
You can manipulate the weather? I've never seen magic like that! Do you take requests, by any chance?
It's... complicated. I wouldn't say I exactly fear it, but I've met my fair share of creatures that hide in the darkness.
I... I'm afraid Demacia doesn't much care for mages, Leonie. I had to keep my light magics a secret, and I wasn't allowed to learn of it officially.
I think you misunderstand, Leonie... Demacia doesn't tolerate magic. I had to keep my light a secret, and was never given any guidance on how to use it — only how to hide it.
Aww, thank you!
Well... I suppose the simplest way to put it is that I ran away from home.
Now that just sounds awful! It seems like no matter where you go, you can't escape people who won't accept those that are different.
Oh, certainly! I do love to dress up, but it's always for formal events, and I never get to pick what I wear...
I can use my powers to protect myself, and my friends! I can also use to to blast apart solid stone. Isn't that neat? And just think, I hardly knew I could do that until recently!
My light can be used to shield my allies from danger... or to blast apart solid stone! Isn't that neat? And to think, I hardly knew what I was capable of until recently!
Well, my armor is that of Demacia. These days, I would hardly say that I fight in the name of Demacia. Though I do still feel a certain patriotism...
My armor belongs to Demacia, but these days... I would hardly say that I fight in its name. At the same time, I still love my home. The patriotism never quite goes away!
Of course! It's easier when I have my wand, but even like this, I can conjure sparks of all sorts. Careful I don't burn your eyes.
You would guess correctly! All Demacian nobles wear armor for protection, and I happen to be one of them... or, at least, I used to be.
I-I'd certainly hope not, Zoe! The idea of my brother seeing me in such a state is mortifying...
"Star Guardian... skin?" I'm not sure what you're talking about, Zoe, but it sounds like a good time!
The chest is your center of mass, Zoe; it makes sense to have it be the most heavily fortified part, doesn't it?
I'm honestly not sure, Reimu. I think I have a lot of potential, but I've hardly had any practice. Say, how would these Western magicians feel about sparring?
A... "Paladin?" I'm sorry, I think you have the wrong idea, Arueshalae. I'm an ordinary magician, nothing more.
I'm not sure what a "Paladin" is, but it sounds neat! I'm nothing more than an ordinary magician, though.
I love to support others! My light will protect you, or deal damage, whichever is needed!
My light can protect, or deal damage, whichever is most needed! I'd be happy to support you, Aaravi!
Not quite, Heris. I was never a full soldier, let alone a member of the Dauntless Vanguard, or a knight.
That's a difficult question for me to answer, Meia. I'd love to return to Demacia, but to do so would be putting myself in danger.
I woud love to return to Demacia, but doing so would only put me at risk of imprisonment... or worse.
Say, Supernova? How do you do that portal spell so casually? One mage to another, do you think you could teach me?
Say, Supernova? How do you do that portal magic of yours so easily? Do you think you could teach me?
Oh, darn... If only I could cast a spell to save myself.
A good sorceress would know a spell for this situation. Too bad this is only a costume.
W-What? But I cast a good luck spell on that hand!
Did somebody cast a curse on me? Now that's just rude.
I didn't train for years at the Sorcerer's Academy for this! ...At least, that's the backstory I just came up with.
Curses... O-Oh no, did I just cast a curse by accident?!
M-Maybe I could just cast a spell on all of you to make you forget this happened...?
Oh, and I spent so much time putting this costume together...
Right out of the gate? Oh, very well then.
Oh! I lost right away... Such a shame.
Of course I had no chance of winning that round...
I had no hope of winning with only a high card...
It was only a matter of time before it was my turn -- but I didn't think it would take this long!
Looks like it's finally my turn! Sorry to put you all to shame!
Looks like it's finally my turn! I guess I have a natural talent for poker!
It's only expected that I'd have to lose a few rounds!
I'm sure I'll still come out on top even after a few losses.
It was simply a matter of time till I lost a few!
I probably should start being a bit more careful, huh?
I don't suppose this is something I can magic my way out of, huh?
This is starting to look a bit out of hand...
That was a bit of a tactical mistake on my part...
If my brother saw me in such a state... I'm sure I'd be dragged out of here in an instant...
I'm starting to regret my decision to come here... No! I will prevail!
Maybe going with the mageseekers wouldn't have been such a bad idea if it saved me this embarrassment...
I'm barely used to not having my armor on in Demacia, let alone show this much skin!
I already feel so bare! I suppose being fully naked won't be too much of a leap...
I've never actually been naked in front of anyone before... So at least this will be a new experience.
I'm just making one mistake after another, aren't I?
I'm still in shock after my last hand, now I have to go again?
Looks like I made another mistake.
I have to go again? But I just stripped! Oh dear...
Looks like I'll have to bare my arms right away.
Whoops! I'll have to be more careful!
I lost? I hope this doesn't start a trend...
I guess I made another mistake, whoops!
I'd better keep my guard up... Or maybe I should learn what cards I need to keep...
Oops. Well, if I'm the loser, it's time to follow the rules!
I'll be fine, as long as I- oh. I'm out?
I guess I really don't know how to play after all...
There hasn't even been time for you to appreciate my... well, my other assets.
I've lost this battle, but I will come back stronger.
Oh, I lost? Very well, if those are the rules I guess I must follow.
You guys are giving me a tough fight.
I guess no one gets away without showing at least some skin.
I hoped to get out of this without showing anything important, but now I seem to have run out of options...
Come on, Lux. You've saved countless mages from the mageseekers, you can save yourself from losing a poker game.
You guys are giving me a tough fight!
This is getting too tense...
I should've expected this. I went in unprepared.
This is starting to look a bit desperate...
I really have to show it all, don't I?
This is the first time anyone has seen me completely naked... So please be gentle.
I'm not quite sure how this works quite yet but I'm sure I'll learn soon!
Ohh... I think I understand what I did wrong there. No matter, I'll come back stronger!
I'm already out? But I just got here! Am I really that bad?
I lost already? But I just got here! And I'm going to be the first one to be nude!
I've lost this battle, but I will come back stronger.
I guess this is what they call a worrying trend...
Maybe I should reconsider my strategy...
Maybe I'm doing something wrong here...
Time to think of a new game plan.
This... doesn't seem to work out good...
A shame, but with the right mindset I can win this uphill battle!
That light of victory is looking dimmer and dimmer by the second...
Yikes, you guys are really bringing your A-game.
All odds are against me, but I will never surrender.
You guys must really want to see my body, huh?
This is going a bit further than I was expecting...
From saving injured Demacians to stripping naked in front of a bunch of strangers... how the mighty fall.
Now this just isn't seemly! Oh... how the mighty have fallen.
Meia already took hers off, so I suppose I shall follow her lead!
Thank you for taking yours off first, Meia! I shall follow your example!
But on the bright side of things, I now have a chance to see the world! I've made all sorts of new acquaintances. Like you, Meia!
Leaving home hasn't shaken my optimism! I've been seeing it as a chance to see the world and meet new people. Like you, Meia!
In normal circumstances, I would've worn a bodysuit like yours, Meia. It looked great on you!
I... I suppose that is true. You and I would both be sent to the Mageseeker's Prison. However, how did you recognize me?
I... I will not stand for you insulting my family in such a manner. Even they are good people at heart! ... Or at least my brother is.
I... I cannot stand idly while you insult my family! Even they are good people at heart! ... Or at least my brother is.
Your sources may be correct, yes. But this is quite a touchy subject to bring up, and it is quite a complex situation...
Not exactly... Most people where I'm from don't consider this a gift.
I wish, but... Many Demacians don't understand magic, so they choose to live in fear of it.
That's true, but doesn't it go against the point if others can't see you?
That sounds like cheating. I generally try to avoid that.
Err... You're not planning to tell somebody about this, are you? I assumed this was all confidential.
No, I... I don't have outbursts like that. Not anymore.
Of course not. There was... somebody... who taught me how to control my light.
One day, I had to protect myself from a ravenous pack of saberwulf. At that moment, my light just... came out of me!
I never knew I could use magic until I had to protect myself from a saberwulf pack. At that moment, my light just... came out of me!
Is that so? I think it's important to be ready for anything... but maybe I can let my guard down here.
Not every lady wants to walk around in a full suit of armor like me. Still, it's better to be ready for anything than to be caught unprepared.
All Demacian nobles wear armor, myself included. I've worn it for so long that the weight doesn't bother me much anymore.
I may not be a front line fighter, but the nobles where I'm from all wear armor. And yes, the steel is heavy -- but you get used to it after a while.
The material of your shirt is of interest to me. I've not encountered much like it in Demacia.
An exchange of fabrics, so to speak? That sounds like a splendid idea, Leon. I'm quite interested in what your outfit is made of.
A-Ah, well, I think we'll have to see how I feel after the game wraps up. My greater judgement says no, b-but I've been known to make some impulsive decisions...
I-Is every man where you're from as forward as you are, Leon? A part of me says I should decline, but it seems that men like you are always the ones who get me to ignore my greater judgement...
I can use my magic to shield others from harm... I haven't yet worked out any other `buffs'.
I'm surprised you didn't know that, Cynthia. Is there not a lot of magic where you're from?
So a light mage does magic with light. Simple. I assume you come from somewhere that doesn't have a lot of magic, Cynthia?
...Wait, did you just call me "Lucky"? I don't know if I would consider myself very lucky.
I can even fire off a massive laser if I have a wand. I call it "Final Spark". I could show it to you sometime.
It's quite alright, Leonie! I'd love to visit Fódlan for myself one day, if they treat magic with respect instead of fear.
It's quite alright, Leonie! I'd love to see your homeland for myself one day. Perhaps I can learn a thing or two!
I'm happy you have the luxury to choose, but for most of my life, I've been beholden to the will of my parents. That's what's expected of a noble daughter.
I'm afraid a noble doesn't have the luxury to choose. For as long as I can remember, I've been told what to wear by my parents, and that's the end of it.
Leaving home behind breaks my heart. But I like to look at the positive side of things!
I like to look on the positive side of things, even though leaving home breaks my heart.
I think you may be confusing me for a member of the Dauntless Vanguard, though they don't use magic, either...
Perhaps you're confusing me for a member of the Dauntless Vanguard, like my brother. But they don't use magic, either...
Oh, my breastplate? This was made by a Demacian battlesmith - I don't know his name, unfortunately.
My armor? It was made by a Demacian battlesmith - I'm afraid I don't know his name, otherwise I could refer you!
Really, Miss Angela? Names like mine are pretty common where I come from - in fact, I've never met someone called Angela!
Oh, no, it's not like that anymore. I met... a person. He taught me how to hide my light.
This armor was crafted by a fine Demacian battlesmith. I assure you, it is not outdated!
This armor was crafted quite recently — it is hardly out of date!
Oh... t-thank you...?
How about... a double rainbow? Are you capable of that?
Could you make... a double rainbow? I'd just love to see one!
A creature that fed on the nightmares of those in a small town, for one... It was a harrowing experience.
Well, I once had to banish a creature that was feeding on people's nightmares... I shudder to even think about it.
I've been surviving with a group of fellow mages. It's... far from comfortable, I admit, but we're managing.
Demacia is my home, ~cat~. It's a noble kingdom with... a few flaws, but good people!
Your suit is magical? I suppose it must give you catlike tread on your missions.
Oh, um... That's nice? The Tao part, I mean... and, er, I suppose the other part, too...
Nothing like that. Let's just say that my homeland was going through an upheaval. Rather than getting caught in it, I chose to flee.
I'm quite sure. Technology where I'm from takes on quite a different form. You can even combine the two - they call that "hextech".
Well ~adrien~, you're about to find out!
A big, fluffy hat... That's the most essential part of any sorcerer, in my opinion.
What kind of sorcerer will I even be without my oversized hat? Not a very good one, I think.
These shoes aren't magical, I don't think... but maybe if I click my heels together...
I'm pretty sure these shoes aren't magical... but what if I tried jumping in the air while thinking about flying...
Why do you think witches wear gloves? Is it to protect themselves from the contents of their own cauldrons?
You can't mess around with a cauldron without a good pair of gloves. Otherwise, you'll get magic all over your hands!
I feel a little unprotected like this, if I'm being honest. Normally I wear these big, clanky boots... Stockings like these won't stop an arrow.
It's strange being so unprotected. A noble has to be prepared for a fight at any time, but these stockings would hardly protect me from a paper cut.
Oh my... I could stall with smaller items, but that would hardly be fair. You're all about to find out what a sorcerer looks like under the outfit...
Alright, then... I could still stall, but that wouldn't feel fair to all of you. I'll show you what a sorcerer looks like under the outfit, too...
I suppose a skin-tight suit isn't completely uncommon outside of Demacia after all...
I was under the impression that bodysuits were a thing of Demacian noblewomen. I suppose I was wrong.
This is pretty exciting after all! It's going to be some kind of... topless party in here!
I can't lie, this is pretty exciting! It's going to be a regular topless party in here!
I suppose if ~crotchvis~ is showing off down there, showing off my chest should even things out!
Since ~crotchvis~ is already showing off down there, revealing my chest should even things out!
If ~mast~ can work up the courage to touch herself, I can certainly show you my chest!
If ~mast~ can work up the courage to touch himself, I can certainly show you my chest!
I'll start with my bracers. That's okay, right?
I suppose I'll start small with... my bracers!
Demacian bracers, off you go!
I suppose logically, my boots should come off next.
Demacian steel boots. Surprisingly comfortable!
Next to come off shall be my boots. Only the finest Demacian steel!
Well, next is my breast plate. Take care of it, okay?
When I had to get this armor made, I decided to skip on the huge pauldrons, like my aunt has.
Next up is my skirt... If I wasn't wearing a bodysuit under this, this would be quite obscene!
Next to go down is my skirt... A totally normal thing to do in front of strangers...
Now I shall strip my skirt... If I didn't have my bodysuit on, this would be quite obscene!
Looks like I'll have to remove my skirt... A completely normal thing to do in front of strangers... haha.
I guess you finally get to see some skin. Aside from my hands, feet, and face.
As if this bodysuit wasn't revealing enough... Well, I suppose it's only hiding my skin, and not my figure.
This sort of bodysuit is all the rage among Demacian noblewomen. I don't understand why...
This bodysuit does nothing to conceal my figure... Really, all it does is hide my navel from prying eyes.
Demacian noblewomen love to wear these kind of skin-tight suits... I started wearing one after lady Fiora did...
Well, let's bring these into the light...
I guess it's time to shine a light on these...
It's time to shine a bit of light on these...
It's not like I wasn't expecting this... here I go!
I don't have anything else left to get rid of... here goes!
I've got nothing left, so here goes!
Time to show you everything I have!
No more holding back!
I don't know if I would have the confidence to wear underwear like yours, Nami!
You know Nami, I don't think I could pull off... what was it called? A thong?
Ah... I suppose that makes sense. I am wearing Demacian armor... Silly me.
Ah... Silly me. I suppose I am wearing Demacian armor...
May we put this matter to rest for a moment? My brother loves me, all is well. Even if I am, as you say, a runaway.
How could you insinuate such a thing?! We are not lovers, and he is not a terrorist!
He is hardly a felon, he was just... misunderstood. Misused. Misguided! Demacia treated him poorly, so naturally things went wrong...
I try to keep my head up. No use moping about it all the time, right?
If the embarrassment is too much, then... Wait, what's that supposed to mean?!
If I really get that upset, then I suppose... Hold on, are you insinuating something?
(What's with this girl...? It's like she's trying to provoke a reaction out of me.)
Thank you, Hermione. I'm certainly not using my powers to make the room glow a little, not at all!
Thank you for your kindness, Hermione. I'm glad to know a young witch such as yourself!
I can take care of myself well enough, Leon -- but teaming up with you doesn't sound so bad!
I think we're both more than equipped to take care of ourselves, Leon -- but it doesn't hurt to watch each other's backs!
My, is it that obvious? I wouldn't be much of a Crownguard if I didn't keep myself in shape. You should see my aunt.
Everybody in my family is in great shape, Leon. If you think my physique is impressive, you should meet my brother.
...O-Oh... Well, that's a different sort of cultural exchange to what I expected, but I am interested if you're as toned as the men where I'm from...
...M-My, you're quite forward... Still, you remind me of the men of Demacia, Leon. I-I wouldn't mind seeing how your physique stacks up to theirs...
What? No, of course not. Some people might, but I think magic should be used to help people. We're all in this together, after all.
Oh my, I can't wait! Now I have something to look forward to after this game!
Now I almost want this game to be over quickly so I can witness that! Oh, but there's still so much to see...
I just try to think of all the good things in the world... like poros. They're adorable and fluffy.
Counting cute things helps, like baby silverwings. Oh, not their adult forms, though... They're less cute.
Oh... alright, Leonie! We can talk about this later.
Oh... alright, Leonie! I understand. We can talk about this more later.
I've never known anyone to have true psychic powers before. At least, not from anyone legitimate. Some street peddlers have claimed to read minds before...
I've never met anyone who had `true' psychic powers before. I can guess that this is another thing Pokémon can do, right?
Well, I've been away from home for a while now, so they don't control much of anything that I can do now. Though, it's not like my current situation allows for much dressing up either...
Rest assured, Nami, my parents have very little control over my life now. Unfortunately, my current circumstances aren't much better for wearing whatever I'd like...
Oh, well... Where do I even begin? I'm a daughter of the Crownguard family, who are tasked with protecting the ruling Lightshield family...
If only it were so simple. Where I'm from, displaying abilities like these out in the open would get you thrown in prison... or worse.
Indeed. Even in our darkest days, so long as we have our friends there to shine a light, we'll be okay!
I appreciate the offer, Miko, but I've learned that mastering my magic is something I'll have to accomplish on my own terms. Though, pleasuring sultry women does sound oddly pleasant...
Oh, no, it's fine! I mean, a lot of bad things have happened recently, but... being here, happily chatting with all these people? It makes it all easier.
Ah, well... I wouldn't go that far.
You see, before meeting people here, I never really knew that people would shave down there...
I hope that answers your question, ~adrien~?
(Maybe the bright lights of Paris will draw their attention away from my underwear?)
W-why would you look at me? Look at the lights of Paris, instead! Aren't they beautiful?
Well, I'm not going to let it get me down! A sorcerer always stays positive... I think!
Well, the third rule of being a sorcerer is to never give up! At least, I'm pretty sure it is!
Oh, I'm only messing around. I don't need shoes, anyway. Sorcerers can fly using magic brooms! I saw it in a book!
Oh, I'm just having fun. It's not like I need to wear shoes, anyway. According to the books I've read, sorcerers can fly on magic brooms!
Without them, well... I'd better be careful if I decide to cast a spell. Who knows what will happen otherwise!
I'd better be careful if I want to cast a spell from here on out. After all, the gloves are coming off! ...No? Too cliche?
Not that I mind, of course. It's nice to try new things every now and then. It's simply odd to feel so... exposed.
I don't mind, of course. I don't imagine a fight's going to break out here any time soon. I'm just not used to feeling so... exposed.
...A Demacian sorcerer, at least. I-I hope it looks the part.
...A sorcerer from Demacia, that is. I-I hope you all think I still look the part.
There's nothing wrong with a bit of casual nudity between girls! ...Right?
Just a bit of casual nudity between girls! That's normal, right? ... Right?
I feel a bit more comfortable doing this thanks to ~female~, but with ~male~ here...
I hope you're happy, ~male~... You get to look at bunch of ladies in the nude. Hmpf.
And of course, the only man here is ~male~. He gets to look at a bunch of beautiful women, like ~female~ and I!
At least I'm not the only one showing it all!
At least I'm not alone in showing it all!
At least I'm not the only one showing everything...
I kind of wish I could keep the protection, with ~aggressive_target~ around and all...
The lady of luminosity is the first one to expose herself in front of others... oh...
I don't know if I would have the confidence to wear... what was the name of it? A thong?
It was getting too warm for these, anyway. To say nothing of those sunny days spent in the blindly white glare of the Grand Plaza...
Unfortunate, but losing these won't have any drawbacks in the battle ahead!
These boots aren't even slightly magical boots.
I've heard that some people are... attracted to the sight of bare feet? Is this true?
I don't need the protection, you guys seem very friendly!
You guys seem friendly enough, I think I'll be fine without the protection!
Maybe I shouldn't wear such tight suits under my armor...
Weird that my skin stays so pale even though I'm handling all that light, isn't it?
Isn't it weird that my skin stays so pale, even though I handle all of that light?
At least I brought a nice set of underwear.
At least I put on some clean underwear today.
On the bright side, I'm wearing a clean set of underwear today!
On a positive note, I'm wearing a nice pair of underwear today!
Ah well, I can't be ashamed of these, right?
I guess I have nothing to be ashamed of!
I can't exactly be ashamed of myself, right? I know I look at least a little pretty...
I hope we can keep this secret...
Please keep this a secret between us, okay?
Please don't spread rumors about this. Keep it a secret between us, okay?
You've already seen me go all the way, ~target~. The least you could do is make things even.
Light 'em up!
I won ... through superior tactics!
Every loss has its consequences.
What are you gonna take off?
I wonder if you had a bad strategy or just bad luck...
Don't be shy, it's not as bad you think it is.
Hope I wasn't distracting you, ~target~!
I can hardly wait until it's ~player~'s turn!
Lead the way for us, ~name~!
Light the way, ~name~!
Don't worry about impressing me, just take off whatever you feel comfortable without!
~Player~ lost the round, but the battle isn't over!
I hope you're not too eager to flash us, ~player~!
You'll have to do better than that if you want to win, ~player~!
Am I still smiling? I can't help it! Sorry, ~player~.
So let me get this straight, Kazuma. You have all the freedom anybody could ask for, and you use it to... steal people's underwear?
You have so much potential with your magical freedom, and you use it to steal underwear? ... I'm disappointed.
You look like you've seen a lot of conflict, Raynor. Are you enlisted in the military, by chance?
Ooh, Aster, you're a knight? What's it like?! Wandering the world, protecting innocents from evil...
Those are "guns" you're holding, right? I've never seen any up close. Is it really safe to be pointing them around like that?
You said you were a soldier, did you not? I've never heard of any army with a uniform like that. Who do you serve, Takatoshi?
I understand you were forced into the future, Takatoshi, but couldn't you just go back? Surely, you must have tried.
Ryuji, you're able to use... what was it called? A Persona? How did you discover such a power within yourself?
Ryuji, you have the power of... what was it called? A Persona? I've never heard of magic like that. How did you discover such a power?
What's it like being an athlete, Ryuji? Do you participate in any sporting tounraments? I've seen soldiers do marathon events as part of their training...
Basil, right? That's such a lovely name! You're... a gardener, right? That's what I heard, at least.
You're Basil, right? Your name is so lovely! I heard that you're a gardener, right?
Basil, that contraption you've been carrying with you... That's a `camera', right? I've heard about them... We don't have them in Demacia yet. Yours looks so high-tech!
That contraption you're carrying with you, Basil... That's a `camera', isn't it? I've heard about this... We don't have them in Demacia just yet. It looks so... advanced! So... high-tech!
Mr. Kennedy, you're a hunter of the undead, right? In my world, your services would be put to good use. Do you have something similar to the Sentinels of Light?
Excuse me, Mr. Kennedy? You're a hunter of the undead, right? My world has seen more than its fair share of undead monsters. Would you happen to work for something similar to the Sentinels of Light?
I apologise for earlier, I shouldn't assume you want to talk about your work here. What do you do in your downtime, Mr. Kennedy?
I feel like I must apologise for earlier, Mr. Kennedy. I can't imagine you want to talk about work so much while you're here. What do you do for fun?
I have to wonder, does ~target~ even care if we get naked or not?
Perhaps this will teach you a lesson, ~target~!
Perhaps this will teach him a lesson!

state.text: Hold on, I'm running out of light puns... I guess you could say I'm in a bright spot! Eh?
I'm starting to run low on light puns... I need to get my creative juices glowing! Eh?

If I've already gotten this naked, you can too, ~name~.

I hope I get to see something nice... (That's flirting, right? Is that how you flirt?)
~Name~ is going to strip? (I hope nobody can see that I'm excited...)
Nearly being nude while a man strips... How scandalous.

The end of the game draws close for me. (At least I get to see ~name~ take something off first...)

Looks like it's your turn again, ~target~!

Another so soon, ~name~? Perhaps you should reevaluate your strategy.
Should I apologize, ~name~? I almost feel bad for you.
This is beginning to become a pattern, isn't it?
You've already seen me go all the way, ~target~. The least you could do is make things even.
This could assist my stimulation...
(~Player~ seems so confident, I wonder how she does it?)
Light 'em up!
I won ... through superior tactics!
Every loss has its consequences.
What are you gonna take off?
I wonder if you had a bad strategy or just bad luck...
Don't be shy, it's not as bad you think it is.
I can hardly wait until it's ~player~'s turn!
Lead the way for us, ~name~!
Light the way, ~name~!
Don't worry about impressing me, just take off whatever you feel comfortable without!
~Player~ lost the round, but the battle isn't over!
I hope you're not too eager to flash us, ~player~!

I find it hard to believe that you're from another world, Meia. All of the otherworldly beings I've read about are flesh-eating monsters. But you seem really nice!
I can hardly believe you're from another world, Meia. All I've heard of otherworldly creatures are that they're big, purple, flesh-eating monsters. But you seem really nice!
I know, maybe Chell can get rid of you, as an accessory! That would make things even, right, Wheatley?
Alright, I'll listen well...
I suppose it will do no harm to listen...
O-okay, um... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward...
Is that a Hextech gun? It doesn't look very - wait, be careful!
That looks like a Hextech gunblade, but without the blade - wait, watch out!
Wait, Miko, if you're a prince... You weren't sent here for an arranged marriage, right? I already told my parents I'm not going to do that.
Wait, Miko, if you're a prince... This isn't another arranged marriage situation, right? I already told my parents I'm not going to do that.
So if Tharja's a dark mage, and I'm a light mage, are we meant to be enemies?
So if Tharja's a dark mage, does that mean she literally controls darkness? How does that work?
Megumin, are you one of those red mages I've heard about?
I've always wondered how another mage would dress, but I didn't expect it to be in bright red!
At least I didn't lose my very first round!
Looks like ~name~ will lead us!
Don't give up ~name~, this is only the first round!
So if you're in a band, which one of you plays the etwahl?
Don't worry, Tomoko! I'm sure you don't look thatugly when you're naked!
Keep your chin up, Saki! You've still got a long way to go!
So this is your only day off a year? And you're spending it like this?
Say, Faye, are you some sort of bounty hunter? You're not hunting any mages, are you?
You remind me of the bounty hunters I've read about, Faye. I hope you're not pursuing any mage-related bounties...
That magatama... It's magical, isn't it? I'm sensing some sort of energy from it.
Is that thing around you neck some sort of magical artifact? There's a faint light coming from it.
Someone who deceives others for their own gain... *sigh* You remind me of a certain someone who I'd rather not remember, Faye.
Is that your school uniform, Ayano? I've never seen anything like it. What kind of school do you go to?
So, Ayano, this "senpai"... Is he cute?
Honestly, Ayano, I'm kind of jealous of you. You're always talking about love, and I don't know if I've ever felt that strongly about... anybody.
Your name is... Spider-Woman, right? You're not some kind of scary Shadow Isles monster under that mask, right?

state.text: You're taking off your mask, right? This should be enlightening!
Your true identity is about to be illuminated, Spider-Woman!

case.state: So you can shoot webs, cling to walls... Where did you learn that kind of magic? I've never seen it before.
All of that equipment you have looks really advanced. Is it some form of Hextech?
A team of heroes that goes around the world helping people... You must be an incredible person if you're working for this "Overwatch".
I'll keep my light to a minimum for your sake, Marceline. We wouldn't want this place to suddenly get brighter.
May, I have to ask, what exactly are these "Pokémon"? I understand that they're magical in nature, at least.
So if I'm getting this right... Are Silverwings a kind Pokémon? You can tame them, they "evolve", they hatch from eggs...
Let's see if I understand... Are Silverwings a kind of Pokémon? You can tame them, they "evolve", they hatch from eggs...
So, Miss Chell can't speak? Are you sure she wants to be here? I mean, if she didn't, I imagine she would just leave...
Is it dangerous on this "Mejare", Jura? Is that why you carry around a rapier?
You know, Miko, you're actually not the first person I've met with a ghost wife.
