If I didn't know better, I would confuse you for a Bilgewater native, Nami. Have you ever been?
A small lady holding a giant hammer... You wouldn't happen to know a woman named Poppy, would you? You two have a lot in common.
So, Saki, where you're from, are all of the girls as unrefined as you?
Saki, where you come from, are all of the girls as unrefined as you? ... Not that that's a bad thing! it's your own personality! I was just wondering if---
Honestly, Miko, there's so much magic coming off of you that it's overpowering. You must be pretty strong, right?
Say, Nami, if your control over the weather isn't magical, then what is it? It certainly doesn't seem like a natural ability.
These "Devil Fruits"... Are there really mere plants that can grant magical abilities, Perona?
Gaining powerful magical abilities from merely eating fruit sounds like Demacia's worst nightmare. Could you shed a light on them, Perona?
You're a Gym Leader, right, Rosa? Does that mean you help others train? You must be really strong!
You rescue animals for a living, Fluttershy? Oh, that sounds so lovely... You must be a very kind person.
Fina, I really like the way you have kept your hair. It looks absolutely beautiful! What's your secret?
I must say, I really like how you have kept your hair, Fina! It looks absolutely wonderful. What's your secret to success?
You must be quite the skilled archer to have earned a nickname like "Windranger." How did you become so experienced with a bow, Lyralei?
Seeing people with bows reminds me of the Demacian Rangers, but few of them are skilled enough to have a nickname like "Windranger." Where does it come from, Lyralei?
That's the right attitude to have, Miku!
Yuna, I've been quite curious... How is it that you obtained your companions? You must be a very powerful sorceress to be able to bind them to this mortal coil.
So, Yuna, what spell did you cast to bind Sachi and Megumi to the mortal realm? I know better than to involve myself with magics like that, but... perhaps you could teach me?
Nagamimi... You should try being less mean-spirited sometime!
Reimu, was it? I'd love to hear more about this "Gensokyo" you hail from. I've never seen it on a map, but it sure sounds interesting!
So this "danmaku" they practice in Gensokyo, Reimu - could I ask you to elaborate? A controlled system for magical battles sounds incredible!
U-Um, Zoe, I hope it's not rude to ask this, but... are you a Voidsent? I've read scant details about them, but I've never heard of one such as you...
Purple skin, tentacle hair, propensity for soul-sucking... Surely you're some kind of Voidsent, Zoe. Still, I've never read of one quite like you...
I've never met a Vastaya in person before, but I've always wanted to! Your ears, and your tails, they're just... they're so fluffy!
So... what's it like in Ionia, Ahri? I've always wanted to go, but I've hardly ever left the borders of Demacia.
I'm... starting to get the feeling we're not so dissimilar, Ahri. You've had trouble with being who you really are too, haven't you?
You look really regal, Miss Turandot. Are you some kind of noble? I'm something of a noble myself... Well, kind of.
You almost look like a monster I'd read about in some stuffy old book, Ms. Arueshalae. But you're so nice that I almost feel bad for thinking that...
I always wondered if I would see a Yordle around here... Or am I mistaken, Trixie?
I apologise if I'm mistaken, Trixie, but aren't you a Yordle? I'd always wondered if I would see one around here...
Have you come across any interesting, magical relics, Trixie? I'd love to hear about your adventurerous tales!
Surely you must have dozens of adventuring stories to share, Trixie? How about... have you found any magical relics in your career?
I must say, you are certainly well endowed for your height, Trixie... You should have no trouble... err... securing a lover.
I imagine you'll have no trouble securing a lover... After all, you are quite... ahem, well endowed for your height...
I've never quite known someone as well read as you, Wikipe-tan! You seem knowledgeable about almost... well, anything!
Are you feeling alright, Nanoko? You seem confused, like a lost Poro.
Are you feeling quite alright, Nanoko? You look like a confused, lost little Poro...
If there's Darkness, there must also be a light!
Where there is light, there is... Darkness! Haha!
You lost your parents? I'm... so sorry to hear that. Though, I suppose you may already be at peace with it.
Ooh, a game? I like games! I'm really good at Tellstones!
Aha! I get the joke now! The two of you swapped clothes! How silly!
I didn't expect to be playing alongside a witch! Don't worry - I'm not a mageseeker.
Do you have any magical stories to share, ~name~? I've heard such interesting things about witches!
I've never actually spoken to another witch before now - wait, I'm not a witch! I take that back! Don't tell anyone I said that!
I was unsure before, but if ~name~ has stuck around for so long, she must want to play as much as the rest of us!
~Name~ certainly knows how to flaunt what she has. How exciting!
~Name~ certainly knows how to put on a good show.
Wow, I can't believe I didn't lose! That was close...
That was close! I thought for sure I was going to be it...
Wait, ~name~ lost? But I thought... oh! That was a close one!
